site_name: Servicing yard to rear of the Duke of York Headquarters, London, SW3
description: Planning permission is sought for: "External alterations associated with the creation of a new area of public realm including alterations to levels, repaving and rationalisation of hard landscaping, creation of seating zones and screen to separate back of house from public realm, installation of plant equipment and plant screens, installation and replacement of louvres, lowering of external standalone curved wall, installation of screens and glazing, installation and replacement of doors and windows, opening up of bricked-up openings, relocation of private access gate, removal of planting and provision of replacement planting, relocation of cycle parking, provision of a bin store, replacement of timber cladding, installation of wire trellis system, replacement of lighting fixtures, and other associated works." Listed building consent is sought for: "Internal and external alterations including reconfiguration of internal layouts including installation of stairs and WCs, alterations to internal slab levels, removal of existing ramp, installation of plant and plant screens, installation and replacement of louvres, lowering of external standalone curved wall, installation of screens and glazing, installation and replacement of doors and windows, removal and relocation of private access gate, removal of awning and porch, reconfiguration of ductwork, replacement of metal handrail, removal of window grates, opening up of bricked-up openings, reconfiguration of lightwell and other associated works."
